recipes.title: Veggie Stew
recipes.method: 1. Pre-heat the oven to 200C/3C/gas 5. Place the carrot, leek and tofu in a large bowl. Add the stock and mix well. 2. Add the rest of the ingredients and mix well. 3. Place the mixture in a large bowl and cover with a lid. 4. Place the lid on the oven and cook for 40 minutes. 5. Serve with a slaw of your choice

recipes.title: Veggie Pizza
recipes.method: 1. Pre-heat the oven to 200C/3C/gas 5. Add the pasata, green pepper and mushrooms to the base. Place the lid on the oven and cook for 30 minutes. 5. Serve with a slaw of your choice

recipes.title: Ribolitta
ingredients: 400g can Co-op butter beans drained and rinsed
recipes.method:
Heat the oil in a large pan and add the onion, garlic, celery and carrot
Season and cook on a low heat, stirring occasionally, for 10 mins
Add the tomatoes, stock and beans, and bring to the boil
Reduce to a simmer and cook for 20 mins, topping up with a little hot water if needed
Add the cabbage and bread for the last 10 mins of cooking
Season to taste, then serve

recipes.title: Spare Ribs
ingredients: Salt and ground pepper, to taste
recipes.method:
Remove the membrane (remember, this ensures fall off the bone ribs).
Generously season both sides with salt and pepper. This is also a great opportunity for adding more flavor with your favorite spice rub.
Cover the ribs with aluminum foil.
Bake the ribs at a low temperature (275°F) for 2 ½ to 4 hours or until they are tender.
Slather the baked ribs with barbecue sauce, and then broil (or grill) the ribs for a few minutes until the sauce is caramelized.
